thread.title: Photo gallery: Oregon college shooting
thread.title_full: Photo gallery: Oregon college shooting - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Photo gallery: Oregon college shooting
text:
Caption Shootings update John Locher / Associated Press Douglas County Sheriff John Hanlin, center, and Celinez Nunez, the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives assistant special agent in charge, left, hold a press conference Oct. 2, 2015, in Roseburg, Ore., on the deadly shooting at Umpqua Community College.
Douglas County Sheriff John Hanlin, center, and Celinez Nunez, the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives assistant special agent in charge, left, hold a press conference Oct. 2, 2015, in Roseburg, Ore., on the deadly shooting at Umpqua Community College.
(John Locher / Associated Press) See more galleries Caption College closed Scott Olson / Getty Images Emergency workers block access to Umpqua Community College on Oct. 2, 2015 in Roseburg, Ore., the day after at least nine people were killed and seven others wounded when Chris Harper Mercer, 26, went on a shooting rampage.
Emergency workers block access to Umpqua Community College on Oct. 2, 2015 in Roseburg, Ore., the day after at least nine people were killed and seven others wounded when Chris Harper Mercer, 26, went on a shooting rampage.
(Scott Olson / Getty Images) See more galleries Photo gallery: At least nine people were killed in a shooting Oct. 1, 2015, at Umpqua Community College in Roseburg, Oregon.
This photo gallery is featured in these articles: Nation & World Oregon shooting victims: Teens just starting out, teacher Nation & World Oregon gunman was kicked out of Army, studied mass shooters Nation & World Campus slaughter: An Oregon town and its dreamers
